about_us.caption: Get to know me before you dive into my content.
about_us.description: I am a self-employed software and web engineer dedicated to learning and teaching JavaScript for client-server architectures. After obtaining my Master's Degree in computer science, I gained experience from the startup world, where I used JavaScript intensively during both my professional life and spare time. Eventually it led me to teach others about these topics and to offer online courses and on-site consulting for companies. I am happy to welcome you on my website :-)

what_i_offer.caption: Why you might want to hire me.

properties.title: Workshops
properties.description: Teaching your team on-site/remote to get them up to speed with the latest web technologies for client-server applications in JavaScript.

properties.title: Code Audit
properties.description: Conducting code reviews for your JavaScript application together with your team or a single person which usually last 2-3 days.

properties.title: MVP
properties.description: Bringing your idea to code from zero to one as a minimal viable product (MVP) and beyond within a well-architected application.

properties.title: Complex Problems
properties.description: Solving complex problems in JavaScript code which you want to have eliminated in your application's code base but no one dares to fix.

properties.title: Writing Code
properties.description: Coding along with your team on a large scale application to make your customers happy with new features and performance improvements.

properties.title: Technical Writing
properties.description: Writing tutorials about your technical product, open source work, or API (all related to JavaScript) to get more publicity for it.
